description: Whether the selected MIDI port should be saved between sessions
Only applies if `save_midi_port` is `true`.Specifies whether the MIDI-Through port should be saved.
If the patch file is updated during Performance Mode, should the list be updated in real-time?
Whether to use an EMACS-style text editor for input prompts
Skip information on how to use performance mode [NOT RECOMMENDED FOR NEWER USERS]
